verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>! it is all <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3585>lies<s%> and <S%H6563>rapine<s%>; the <S%H2964>prey<s%> departeth <S%H4185>not<s%>.

The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7752>whip<s%>, and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7494>rattling<s%> of <S%H212>wheels<s%>, and <S%H1725>prancing<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H7540>bounding<s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%>,

the <S%H6571>horseman<s%> <S%H5927>mounting<s%>, and the <S%H1300>flashing<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and the <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%>, and a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2491>slain<s%>, and a <S%H3514>great<s%> heap of <S%H6297>corpses<s%>, and there is no <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H6297>bodies<s%>; they <S%H3782>stumble<s%> upon their <S%H1472>bodies<s%>;â€”

because of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of the <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> of the <S%H2896>well-favored<s%> <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%>, that <S%H4376>selleth<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> through her <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%>, and <S%H4940>families<s%> through her <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%>.

Behold <S%H5002><s%>, I am against thee, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and I will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> thy <S%H7757>skirts<s%> upon thy <S%H6440>face<s%>; and I will <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> thy <S%H4626>nakedness<s%>, and the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> thy <S%H7036>shame<s%>.
And I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> abominable <S%H8251>filth<s%> upon <S%H5034>thee<s%>, and make thee vile, and will <S%H7760>set<s%> thee as a <S%H7210>gazing-stock<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7200>pass<s%>, that all they that look upon thee shall <S%H5074>flee<s%> from <S%H559>thee<s%>, and say, <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>: who will <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> <S%H370>her<s%>? whence shall I <S%H1245>seek<s%> comforters for <S%H5162>thee<s%>?

Art thou <S%H3190>better<s%> than <S%H4996>No<s%> - <S%H527>amon<s%>, that was <S%H3427>situate<s%> among the <S%H2975>rivers<s%>, that had the <S%H4325>waters<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2426>her<s%>; whose rampart was the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and her <S%H2346>wall<s%> was of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>?
Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were her <S%H6109>strength<s%>, and it was <S%H369>infinite<s%>; <S%H6316>Put<s%> and <S%H3864>Lubim<s%> were thy <S%H5833>helpers<s%>.

Yet was she carried <S%H1473>away<s%>, she <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>; her young <S%H5768>children<s%> also were dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all the <S%H2351>streets<s%>; and they <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for her honorable <S%H3513>men<s%>, and all her great <S%H1419>men<s%> were <S%H7576>bound<s%> in <S%H2131>chains<s%>.
Thou also shalt be <S%H7937>drunken<s%>; thou shalt be <S%H5956>hid<s%>; thou also shalt <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> because of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.

All thy <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> shall be like <S%H8384>fig-trees<s%> with the <S%H1061>first-ripe<s%> figs: if they be <S%H5128>shaken<s%>, they <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H398>eater<s%>.

Behold <S%H5971><s%>, thy people in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee are <S%H802>women<s%>; the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%> are set <S%H6605>wide<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> unto thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>: the <S%H784>fire<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> thy <S%H1280>bars<s%>.

Draw <S%H7579><s%> thee <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H4692>siege<s%>; <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> thy <S%H4013>fortresses<s%>; <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H2916>clay<s%>, and <S%H7429>tread<s%> the <S%H2563>mortar<s%>; make <S%H2388>strong<s%> the <S%H4404>brickkiln<s%>.

There shall the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H2719>thee<s%>; the sword shall cut thee <S%H3772>off<s%>; it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thee like the <S%H3218>canker-worm<s%>: make thyself <S%H3513>many<s%> as the <S%H3218>canker-worm<s%>; make thyself <S%H3513>many<s%> as the <S%H697>locust<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H7402>merchants<s%> above the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: the <S%H3218>canker-worm<s%> <S%H6584>ravageth<s%>, and fleeth <S%H5774>away<s%>.

Thy <S%H4502>princes<s%> are as the <S%H697>locusts<s%>, and thy <S%H2951>marshals<s%> as the swarms of <S%H1462>grasshoppers<s%>, which <S%H2583>encamp<s%> in the <S%H1448>hedges<s%> in the <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, but when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>ariseth<s%> they flee <S%H5074>away<s%>, and their <S%H4725>place<s%> is not <S%H3045>known<s%> where they <S%H335>are<s%>.

Thy <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H5123>slumber<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; thy <S%H117>nobles<s%> are at <S%H7931>rest<s%>; thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H6335>scattered<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and there is none to gather <S%H6908>them<s%>.

There is no <S%H3545>assuaging<s%> of thy <S%H7667>hurt<s%>: thy <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous<s%>: all that <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8088>report<s%> of thee <S%H8628>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%> over <S%H7451>thee<s%>; for upon whom hath not thy wickedness <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>?
